channel.title: Any quick way to update all the player.cfg files?
channel.description:
Added clans to easy rsc source and is there a easy way so I can add clans=nulls to all the player.cfg files. It would take too long to edit each one.
Edit - Also wondering how to delete lines I dont need from all the player.cfg files. Like how would I delete kills=0 from all the player.cfg files.
Thanks in advance!

item.title: Any quick way to update all the player.cfg files?
item.dc:creator: @Nemesis1 Nemesis-
item.description:
@Nemesis1 wrote:

snoopy89:

You flaming at ALL my posts literally! All I’ve seen of you is constantly shit talk about people, server, suggestions etc, etc, etc. And then you say my “come backs” are shit, like I even made a comeback, I’m not even talking to you, idiot. Then again you really are a idiot. Everything you say about me, I can say about you.

Now that’s a comeback.
Quote a post where I’ve talked shit about people that haven’t done anything to me, or don’t deserve it, or servers, or suggestions good luck finding one.

item.title: Any quick way to update all the player.cfg files?
item.dc:creator: @Dehumanized Dehumanized
item.description:
@Dehumanized wrote:

Snoopy, that will write the clan to null every single log in/out. Not a good way.

@moparboyrunescape: If it’s too much for you to do a little research for the script, then I suggest you do it manually. I don’t believe anyone here will spoon feed you anything.
Look at how the server writes information into the database, and go from there.

Read full topic
item.source: Any quick way to update all the player.cfg files?

item.title: Any quick way to update all the player.cfg files?
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

in player class, it will overWrite/add to each player when they logout.

If someone already created a clan and it shows “clan=myclan” they will be nulled when they logout.

Read full topic
item.source: Any quick way to update all the player.cfg files?

item.title: Any quick way to update all the player.cfg files?
item.dc:creator: @moparboyrunescape moparboyrunescape
item.description:
@moparboyrunescape wrote:

And in what .java file would I put that in? Also do you mean it will overwrite all the clans right now to NULL or everytime players login/logout the server it will overwrite the clans to NULL?

Read full topic
item.source: Any quick way to update all the player.cfg files?

item.title: Any quick way to update all the player.cfg files?
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

[quote=“snoopy89, post:7, topic:354846”]*Just do a check on the savings, if clan= exist or not, if not the system will write it.
Will automatic save/add clan=null do players who login/logout.
BUT it will overwrite all existed clans to null.
pr.setProperty(“clan”, “null”);

Theres 100 better ways to do it[/quote]

updated it

Read full topic

item.title: Any quick way to update all the player.cfg files?
item.dc:creator: @moparboyrunescape moparboyrunescape
item.description:
@moparboyrunescape wrote:

snoopy89:

*Just do a check on the savings, if clan= exist or not, if not the system will write it.

How do I write a check on savings? and how would I make the system write clan=NULL if it doesn’t exist on all the player.cfg files.

Read full topic

item.title: Any quick way to update all the player.cfg files?
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

*Just do a check on the savings, if clan= exist or not, if not the system will write it.
Will automatic save/add clan=null do players who login/logout.
BUT it will overwrite all existed clans to null.
pr.setProperty(“clan”, “null”);

Theres 100 better ways to do it.
